Text: Everything, virtually everything that "members of LDS have" on preparedness is openly available at no cost here: http://www.providentliving.org/

By the way, this document is NOT an LDS Church publication. "Members of LDS" do not have this publication.  It is a compilation from numerous sources by some random individual - notice on page 2 it says, "This publication has not been endorsed or produced by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints."  So you're not getting a copy of some mysterious, secret document here.  Just FYI.
